he came out to meet Prince Andrew. "Franz, put the prince's things in my bedroom," said he to the servant who was ushering Bolk6nski in. "So you're a messenger of victory, eh? Splendid! And I am sitting here ill, as you see." 
After washing and dressing, Prince Andrew came into the diplomat's luxurious study and sat down to the dinner prepared for him. Bili- bin settled down comfortably beside the fire.
